H0.text: when did south sudan join east african community. 2010

H1.text: when did south sudan join east african community. 2014

H2.text: when did south sudan join east african community. 2012

H3.text: when did south sudan join east african community. 2016

A4.text: South Sudan acceded to the Treaty of the East Africa Community on 15 April 2016 and became a full member on 15 August 2016.

A5.text: South Sudan was eventually approved for membership in East African Community in March 2016, and formally acceded with the signature of the treaty in April 2016.
